name: Chief Executive Officer
jobDescription: The highest ranking company executive with final responsibility for major strategic decisions and management of operation and corporate resources. Acts as primary contact between the Board of Directors and corporate operations. The CEO is also the "public face" of the company.

name: Chief Operations Officer
jobDescription: The senior executive overseeing all day-to-day non-technical operational corporate functions.

name: General Manager
jobDescription: Senior manager overseeing (non-consumer/non-client) internal, partner, and other 3rd party relationships, as well as overall company policy/processes and corporate expenses.

name: Chief Technical Officer
jobDescription: The senior executive in charge of technical implementation and operations.

name: Chief Financial Officer
jobDescription: The senior executive in charge of corporate accounting records and strategic finance.

name: Controller
jobDescription: Senior manager with direct responsibility for the corporate accounts and books. Oversees all payables and receivables. Conducts internal financial audits and is the primary contact for external financial auditors.

name: Accountant
jobDescription: Responsible for maintaining Company financial records.

name: Chief Marketing Officer
jobDescription: The senior executive in charge of brand management, corporate and product messaging, and revenue generation.

name: Training Manager
jobDescription: Responsible for development and implementation of client training curriculum.

name: Chief Sales Officer
jobDescription: The senior executive in charge of corporate sales strategy and oversight of the sales team.

name: Sales Agent
jobDescription: Responsible for directly selling to potential clients.

name: Implementations Manager
jobDescription: Oversees implementation of corporate services/products with clients. Works directly with clients and with the client's assigned Account Manager during the implementation process.

name: Account Manager
jobDescription: Operates as the primary point of contact for assigned clients.

name: Chief Administrative Officer
jobDescription: Senior executive in charge of corporate administration, including human resources and legal matters.

name: Human Resources Head
jobDescription: Manages Human Resources Agents and has final responsibility on HR matters.

name: Human Resources Agent
jobDescription: Oversees personnel management and compliance.

name: Product Manager
jobDescription: Responsible for coordinating stakeholder input and managing product specification and setting development priorities.

name: UI Designer
jobDescription: Produces style guidelines, graphic/UI assets, mockups, and similar artifacts to guide and support implementation of front-end user interface.

name: Brand Manager
jobDescription: Manages brand assets and usage along with setting and enforcing policy regarding corporate messaging and identity.

name: Social Media Coordinator
jobDescription: Responsible for developing and implementing overall social media strategy inline with brand and product messaging and target demographics.

name: Regional Marketing Manager
jobDescription: Oversees implementation of corporate marketing campaigns. Develops and oversees implementation of local campaigns.

name: Software Engineer
jobDescription: Qualified to modify and review [qual] software code. Sensitive changes must be reviewed by a Senior Software Engineer prior to being deployed.

name: Senior Software Engineer
jobDescription: Qualified to review and approve changes to sensitive [qual] code.

name: Chief Software Engineer
jobDescription: Has final responsibility for production [qual] code.; Chief Software Engineer's approval is required for sensitive changes involving customer privacy, regulatory issues, and/or exceptional complexity.

name: Data Engineer
jobDescription: Qualified to modify, review, and manage [qual] database schemas and DBMSs.

name: Senior Data Engineer
jobDescription: Qualified to review and approve changes to production [qual] schemas and DBMSs.

name: Chief Data Engineer
jobDescription: Has final responsibility for production schemas and DBMSs.; Chief Data Engineer's approval is required for sensitive changes involving customer privacy, regulatory issues, and/or exceptional complexity.

name: Host Engineer
jobDescription: Qualified to configure and management of [qual] hosts systems.

name: Senior Host Engineer
jobDescription: Qualified to approve changes to production [qual] host systems.

name: Chief Host Engineer
jobDescription: Has final responsibility for production host systems.; Chief Host Engineer approval is required for sensitive changes involving host security, regulatory issues, or exceptional complexity.

name: Network Engineer
jobDescription: Qualified to configure and manage Company networks.

name: Senior Network Engineer
jobDescription: Qualified to review and approve changes to production networks.

name: Chief Network Engineer
jobDescription: Has final responsibility for the integrity and security of production networks.; Chief Network Engineer approval is required for changes to sensitive networks providing access to private customer data, under regulatory scrutiny, or any change of exceptional complexity.

name: Cloud Engineer
jobDescription: Qualified to configure and manage [qual] cloud services.

name: Senior Cloud Engineer
jobDescription: Qualified to review and approve changes to production [qual] cloud services.

name: Chief Cloud Engineer
jobDescription: Has final responsibility for production cloud services systems.; Chief Cloud Engineer approval is required for sensitive changes involving cloud services security, regulatory issues, or exceptional complexity.

name: Quality Engineer
jobDescription: Qualified to ascertain correctness and conformance of [qual] systems.

name: Senior Quality Engineer
jobDescription: Qualified to review and approve changes [qual] quality systems.

name: Chief Quality Engineer
jobDescription: Has final responsibility for quality assurance.

name: Project Manager
jobDescription: Responsible for working with implementation product management to optimize implementation with regard to efficiency and stakeholder priorities.

name: Customer Service Agent
jobDescription: Responsible for handling of customer service requests.

name: Customer Service Manager
jobDescription: Oversees Customer Service Agents. Sensitive issues of particular complexity or involving particularly high value customers may be referred to the Customer Service Manager.

name: In House Counsel
jobDescription: Oversees legal matters, agreements, and advises Company on [qual] matters.

name: Policy Engineer
jobDescription: Manages and develops Company policy definition and implementation. Also works on verification, evidence gathering and compliance.

name: Head Policy Engineer
jobDescription: Leads the Company's internal policy development, implementation, and verification.

name: Security Officer
jobDescription: Non-executive officer with final responsibility for matters relating to Company security.

duties.description: Works with senior management to develop and maintain the Company's security policy and infrastructure. _(PCI DSS 3.2.1 ref 12.4, 12.5.1, 12.5.3)_

Works with line management and technical staff to implement Company security policy to ensure understanding, improve effectiveness, and where possible simplify and automate end user procedures. _(PCI DSS 3.2.1 ref 12.4, 12.5.1, 12.5.3)
Develops curriculum for and oversees implementation of a Security Awareness Program. _(PCI DSS 3.2.1 ref 12.6)_
Is a member of the Senior Management Team. _(SOC 2 Type I ref 1.1.d, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.1.d)_

name: Compliance Officer
jobDescription: Non-executive officer with final responsibility for matters relating to compliance and Company Policy in general.

duties.description: Ensures Company Policy is compliant with PCI DSS 3.2.1, SOC 2 Type I, and SOC 2 Type II compliance standards.
Oversee and ensure updates to Company Policy are according to the Company Change Control Policy.
Works with <role>department heads</role> to define, implement, and maintain procedures.
Is a member of the Senior Management Team. _(SOC 2 Type I ref 1.1.d, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.1.d)_

name: Privacy Officer
jobDescription: Non-executive officer with final responsibility for matters relating to customer and staff privacy.

duties.description: Is a member of the Senior Management Team. _(SOC 2 Type I ref 1.1.d, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.1.d)_

name: Key Admin
jobDescription: Responsible for managing one or more Company keys involved in critical operations or sensitive access.
notes: The designation is generally applied to Executives, Compliance Agents, and/or domain Chiefs or Seniors. Sufficient backups should be provided such that a Key Manager is available at all times for all key types.

name: Access Manager
jobDescription: Can oversee and grant access to sensitive systems.

name: Operational Admin
jobDescription: Has full access to sensitive operational services. May be designated for emergency and/or backup purposes.

name: Incident Responder
jobDescription: On call for Emergency Response and/or Disaster Recovery situations.
notes: The 'Chief' and at least one 'Senior' of each type is generally designated an incident responder, where possible.; Sufficient backups should be provided such that Incident Responders with particular responsibilities are always available.

name: Network Alert Responder
jobDescription: Responsible for receiving and evaluating network alerts.

name: Badge Manager
jobDescription: Badge Managers oversee issuing and tracking visitor badges.; Sufficient backups should be designated such that a Badge Manager is always available at each physical location.

name: Production Data Reader
jobDescription: An individual with access to sensitive production data.

name: Sensitive Data Handler
jobDescription: Qualified to deal with sensitive data such as card holder data, social security numbers, or other information that requires special handling.

name: VPN Manager
jobDescription: Manages the company's centralized VPN services.

name: Consultant
jobDescription: Provides general or project specific [qual] expertise. Specific duties will be enumerated as part of the epmloyement or contractor agreement

name: Senior Management Team
jobDescription: Annually reviews Company compliance and key processes.

name: Department Heads
jobDescription: Heads a company department. Genarally, non-executive personell report dircetly or indirectly to a department head and collectively the department heads should encompass all company staff with the exception of the CEO and the Department Heads themselves.

name: Change Control Board
jobDescription: Reviews proposed changes and assigns priorities in accordance with cost and strategic priorities.

name: IT Personnel
jobDescription: Any individual working within a technical capacity within the company.
